about_the_game:
Step into the eerie world of Ayasa, a platformer that blends quests, horror, and puzzles into a thrilling adventure. Navigate six lands corrupted by darkness and restore balance by uncovering the light left behind. With its rich atmosphere and unique gameplay, Ayasa challenges you to survive a world full of danger, mystery and wonder.

 Story:

The Inverted World was once a harmonious place where good and evil coexisted, maintained by Tas, the Absolute. But now, darkness threatens to engulf everything, and Ayasa must embark on a perilous journey through the devastated lands of Faith, Hope, Love, Greed, Indifference, and Betrayal. Only by finding the remnants of Tas’s light can Ayasa hope to restore balance and save the world from complete destruction.

Key Features:

  • A Dark and Surreal World: Explore hauntingly beautiful lands with a mix of vibrant and oppressive visuals.

  • Light and Shadow Mechanics: Use light to reveal hidden paths and manipulate shadows to navigate treacherous environments.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles that test your logic, timing and creativity to progress.

  • Unique Abilities: Unlock Ayasa’s powers to outwit enemies and uncover secrets throughout the Inverted World.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Experience a deeply atmospheric journey with a blend of horror and surrealism.

Gameplay:

In Ayasa, you will navigate treacherous lands using light and shadow to solve puzzles, evade enemies, and uncover hidden secrets. Each area offers unique challenges, combining platforming with exploration, keeping you on your toes as you progress.

Embark on this unforgettable adventure and uncover the mysteries of the Inverted World. Will you restore balance or be consumed by the darkness?

Art Direction

Step into a magical realm where every visual detail enchants. Influenced by Tim Burton and René Laloux, our art direction blends dark fantasy with a minimalist color palette to evoke both terror and wonder. Our levels, alive and surreal, are more than mere settings; they are vibrant characters that tell tales of awe, fear, and reflection.

Welcome to a universe where each lit screen opens a portal to a surreal, noir fantasy world. Explore symbolic lands that transform every moment into a profound visual and emotional experience.

reviews:
“"Ayasa: Shadows of Silence‘s world feels somewhat similar, blending a mix of traditional fantasy vistas with eerie, Little Nightmares-style themes. For me, it was an immediate wishlist based purely on its aesthetic alone."”
Lauren Bergin from PCGAMESN

“''If you’re hankering for an indie horror experience akin to Little Nightmares, I think I’ve found it. A first look at Ayasa: Shadow of Silence dropped today, an upcoming platformer blending exploration, puzzles, and horror to deliver a spooky narrative-driven experience.''”
Alex Gibson from Nerd Stash

“''Ayasa, Shadows of Silence has a creepiness of its own, combined with its own brand of gameplay.''”
Mike Wilson from Bloody Disgusting
